page.title: 16LOCAL GOVERNMENT NASH AREA
page.content: NATIONAL - Parliamentary Constituency of Buckingham - Member is from the Conservative Party. REGIONAL - Area is in County of Buckinghamshire Electoral Division No 4O - Elected representative from Conservative Party. DISTRICT - Area in Aylesbury Vale District Council - Nash and Beachampton within Great Horwood Ward. Thornton is in Luffield Abbey Ward. LOCAL - Nash and Beachampton have Parish Councils of 5 members. Both have 4 ordinary and one AGM a year. Thornton has an Annual Parish Meeting but no Parish Council because it is a hamlet. The rateable value of Aylesbury Vale for 85 is General - 1.44p; Water - l4.7p + 15% sewerage. SERVICES _Anglia Water Authority _ water and sewerage: Thames Valley Police - Milton Keynes Division.
